postCreateCommand.minikube-start: minikube profile list | grep dev | grep Running || minikube start -p dev

postAttachCommand.ensure-fission: kubectl apply --server-side -k github.com/fission/fission/crds/v1?ref=v1.20.5 && helm upgrade --atomic --cleanup-on-fail --create-namespace  --install --namespace fission --repo https://fission.github.io/fission-charts --reset-values --set serviceType=NodePort,routerServiceType=NodePort --version v1.20.5 --wait fission fission-all
